Text: Can this iso be busted and then additional programs be added and if so how do you go about doing that. Can you just add programs to the programs folder? TIA.
@press2010   I'm sure it can be, however I wouldn't know how to do it myself.   I do believe however you should be able to run programs from your storage drives.
